title: C Section
description: This item is not properly implemented into the game yet, and simply gives an appearance similar to Tainted Lilith
Collecting this item is still required for the 100% Dead God achievement, however it does not appear in any item pools.
Ways to get this item include: Using Death Certificate, as one of Eden's random starting items, Eden's Birthright effect or using Spindown Dice on Lil Abaddon.
